summary: Optimized context files by consolidating 6 redundant orchestration files into 3 focused files (orchestration-core.md, orchestration-validation.md, orchestration-reference.md). Achieved 78% line reduction for essential patterns (3,693 -> 822 lines). Fixed index.md duplicates, added deprecation notices with migration paths, and updated all broken references.

artifacts.summary: Consolidated delegation, routing, session tracking patterns (249 lines)
Consolidated return validation and error handling patterns (234 lines)
Examples, troubleshooting, and quick reference (310 lines)
Implementation summary with metrics and verification
